ca.ualberta.cs.team1travelexpenseapp.claims

Class Claim

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.team1travelexpenseapp.claims.Claim
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClaimInfo, Comparable<Claim>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApprovedClaim, ProgressClaim, SubmittedClaim

    public class Claim
extends Object
implements ClaimInfo, Comparable<Claim>
    * Claim is the base class for containing a user's claim information. Claim object encapsulates various types of the user's claim information needed for the various services that the app supports. This information includes:
    • The Expense List
    • Claimant Name
    • Start date of travel
    • End Date of travel
    • Destinations visited
    • Claim Tags
    • Is complete flag
    • Approvers
    • Comments
    • Status

    Since:
    1.0

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Claim claim)
        override comapreTo method so that claims will be sorted by largest to smallest date for a Claimant user and oldest to newest for an Approver user. Note only two types of users exists. use Collections.sort(ArrayList Object); to sort Object.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface ClaimInfo
        Specified by:
